recentTweets.name: StarlinkSeabourn
recentTweets.description: 150+ cruise ships and counting around the world are set to use Starlink, helping to make their passengers travel experience even more enjoyable Keeping you connected while exploring the most remote regions of the world.  #SeabournVenture and soon-to-sail #SeabournPursuit are now equipped with @SpaceX’s Starlink Wi-Fi – enabling guests to enjoy a reliable connection to share expedition moments with loved ones.

recentTweets.name: StarlinkSpaceX
recentTweets.description:
With Starlink, users can engage in online gaming which historically wasn’t possible with satellite internet. 

Back in December, the Starlink team supported the  Chapter 4 release with —enabling ~100 hours of gameplay and ~50 hours of streaming for… Show moreそして日本のみなさんも @LiaqN_ , @Captain_Shota , @Reyekun ありがとうございます
